description:

Use code: ipad2024 at checkout

The new 2024 iPad Pro has a great new OLED screen and a M4 processor. Pair that with the new Apple Pencil Pro and you have a really nice upgrade. here are my first impressions of Apple's new tablet.

title: 2024 iPad Pro - I've Been Drawing on it for 5 Days
